title: Acct Exec.-Sales at University of Washington - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Call sales leads issued by UW Athletics; generate new leads focusing on football, menÂ’s basketball, and other sports as assigned.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
